name: Surprise! Attack
description:
You are a duck on a mission to get through this dungeon and get back your rubber duckie that someone stole from you…but something’s going on in this dungeon. All the weapons and items can speak, and they don’t like you..?

Surprise! Attack is a dungeon-crawler where your enemies are the monsters around you AND your very own equipment.

Slay enemies, dodge arrows, and parry attacks successfully to unleash powerful abilities, or risk your own life!

Controls:
Move - WASD
Interact - E/Shift
Shoot - LMB
Bomb - RMB
Dash - Space
Parry - Shift/E
Pause - P

Credits:
2D Art -  Mik Montaño
UI/UX - Val Cobankiat
Programming - Tup Luisking
Game Design - Mik Montaño, Val Cobankiat, Tup Luisking
3D Assets - Kay Lousberg
Audio - Kenney

(This is an entry for our office's internal game jam 🙌)
